details.name: Tim Grieve
details.summary: Cloud System Administrator with over 10 years IT infrastructure experience and 5 years supporting Azure, AWS and hybrid cloud infrastructure. Passionate advocate for the use of Infrastructure as code tooling along with strong Python and Powershell scripting experience.

projects.name: Cloud Resume Challenge
projects.summary: Objective: Publish your resume to a website including a javascript hit counter. Use serverless applications, infrastructure as code and CI/CD pipelines.

experience.title: Senior IT Administrator, Digital Workplace & IT Systems
experience.job_description: Subject matter expert in the implementation and configuration of identity management and security, collaboration tools, device management, application and database services

experience.title: System Administrator
experience.job_description: Generalist System Administrator managing Windows Server Infrastructure, Active Directory, Exchange, VMWARE and M365

experience.title: Technical Account Manager
experience.job_description: MSP System Administrator with technical ownership of the design, deployment and maintenance of assigned customer accounts

experience.title: Professional Services Engineer
experience.job_description: Professional services engineer in the mobility and collaboration practice, focused on design and implementation of Microsoft cloud services and hybrid connectivity

experience.title: Server Administrator
experience.job_description: MSP System Administrator focused on the management of Windows Server Infrastructure, Applications(Active Directory, Exchange) virtualisation(Hyper-v,VMWARE) and physical data center hardware

certifications.title: ICAgile Certified Professional - Foundations of DevOps
